mapper.select: FROM PERIL_CODE T ORDER BY T.DESCRIPTION

SELECT T.PERIL_CODE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T.EXPIRY_DATE, T.DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE, T.CREATE_USER, T.CREATE_DATE, T.UPDATE_USER, T.UPDATE_DATE FROM PERIL_CODE T WHERE T.PERIL_CODE = #{perilCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PERIL_CODE ( PERIL_CODE, DESCRIPTION, EFFECTIVE_DATE, EXPIRY_DATE, DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{dto.perilCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.description, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, #{dto.effectiveDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.expiryDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE PERIL_CODE SET DESCRIPTION = #{dto.description, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, EFFECTIVE_DATE = #{dto.effectiveDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, EXPIRY_DATE = #{dto.expiryDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=DATE, mode=IN}, DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE = #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}, UPDATE_USER = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE PERIL_CODE = #{dto.perilCode, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN} AND DATA_SYNC_TRANS_DATE < #{dto.dataSyncTransDate, javaType=java.util.Date , jdbcType=TIMESTAMP, mode=IN}
